name: Cos(余弦)😶‍🌫️
fullText:
😶‍🌫️看看盗币脚本都喜欢从你电脑(Windows/
macOS/Linux等)里采集什么文件走：

const searchKey = [
    "*.env*",
    "*metamask*",
    "*phantom*",
    "*bitcoin*",
    "*btc*",
    "*Trust*",
    "*phrase*",
    "*secret*",
    "*phase*",
    "*credential",
    "*profile*", https://t.co/TTwZJdjziR

name: OpenBuild
fullText:
Mantle Meetup in Hangzhou was a huge success,  co-hosted by @OpenBuildxyz & @0xMantleCN @Mantle_Official.

On Aug 9, 100+ developers, builders & partners gathered at Hangzhou to shape the future of banking-grade blockchain.

🔹 Deep dives:
✅  Mantle Network / mETH Protocol / https://t.co/ub4OrSR6l6
